attributes.action: Minimum payment for Lorry Drivers week day 15£p/h.
attributes.additional_details: Employers want drivers for rubish monay, agencys pay same lower rates. We want decent earnings for drivers.
attributes.background: Lorry drivers is very responsibility for load and all of transport in the road. We need real payment for it. Not warehouse pay. We want to have minimum 15£ p/h on week days, one and half p/h on saturdays and double p/h on sundays.

rejection.details:
The UK Government sets a National Minimum Wage and a National Living Wage, which applies to all workers. The Government and Parliament are not responsible for setting minimum wages for particular industries. This is a matter for individual employers.

We have published a petition calling for the Government to increase the minimum wage, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301749
